name: searchengine

params.description: control options
params.name: options

params.description: API key. The key "calcul" is used by default.
params.name: options.apiKey

params.description: use of ssl or not (default true, service requested using https protocol)
params.name: options.ssl

params.description: collapse mode, true by default
params.name: options.collapsed

params.description: force control to be never collapsed, false by default.
params.name: options.opened

params.description: TODO : position of picto, by default : "start"
params.name: options.direction

params.description: Placeholder in search bar. Default is "Rechercher un lieu, une adresse".
params.name: options.placeholder

params.description: set a marker on search result, defaults to true.
params.name: options.displayMarker

params.description: Marker style. Currently possible values are "lightOrange" (default value), "darkOrange", "red" and "turquoiseBlue".
params.name: options.markerStyle

params.description: False to disable advanced search tools (it will not be displayed). Default is false (not displayed)
params.name: options.displayButtonAdvancedSearch

params.description: False to disable advanced search tools (it will not be displayed). Default is false (not displayed)
params.name: options.displayButtonGeolocate

params.description: False to disable advanced search tools (it will not be displayed). Default is false (not displayed)
params.name: options.displayButtonCoordinateSearch

params.description: False to disable advanced search tools (it will not be displayed). Default is true (displayed)
params.name: options.displayButtonClose

params.description: coordinates search options.
params.name: options.coordinateSearch

params.description: TODO : target location of results window. By default under the search bar.
params.name: options.coordinateSearch.target

params.description:
list of coordinates units, to be displayed in control units list.
     Values may be "DEC" (decimal degrees), "DMS" (sexagecimal) for geographical coordinates,
     and "M" or "KM" for metric coordinates
params.name: options.coordinateSearch.units

params.description:
list of projection systems, default are Geographical ("EPSG:4326"), Web Mercator ("EPSG:3857") and Lambert 93 ("EPSG:2154").
     Each array element (=system) is an object with following properties :
params.name: options.coordinateSearch.systems

params.description: Proj4 crs alias (from proj4 defs). e.g. : "EPSG:4326". Required
params.name: options.coordinateSearch.systems.crs

params.description: CRS label to be displayed in control. Default is crs code (e.g. "EPSG:4326")
params.name: options.coordinateSearch.systems.label

params.description: CRS units type for coordinates conversion : "Geographical" or "Metric". Default: "Geographical"
params.name: options.coordinateSearch.systems.type

params.description: advanced search options for geocoding (filters). Properties can be found among geocode options.filterOptions (see {@link http://ignf.github.io/geoportal-access-lib/latest/jsdoc/module-Services.html#~geocode Gp.Services.geocode})
params.name: options.advancedSearch

params.description: TODO : target location of results window. By default under the search bar.
params.name: options.advancedSearch.target

params.description: resources to be used by geocode and autocompletion services :
params.name: options.resources

params.description: resources geocoding, by default : "location"
params.name: options.resources.geocode

params.description: resources autocompletion, by default : ["PositionOfInterest", "StreetAddress"]
params.name: options.resources.autocomplete

params.description: false to disable search service, by default : "false"
params.name: options.resources.search

params.description: options of search service
params.name: options.searchOptions

params.description: options of search service
params.name: options.searchOptions.serviceOptions

params.description: url of service
params.name: options.searchOptions.serviceOptions.url

params.description: index of search, "standard" by default
params.name: options.searchOptions.serviceOptions.index

params.description: list of search fields, each field is separated by a comma. "title,layer_name" by default
params.name: options.searchOptions.serviceOptions.fields

params.description: number of response in the service. 1000 by default
params.name: options.searchOptions.serviceOptions.size

params.description: list of search services, each field is separated by a comma. "WMTS,WMS" by default
params.name: options.searchOptions.serviceOptions.services

params.description: number of results in the response. 10 by default
params.name: options.searchOptions.serviceOptions.maximumResponses

params.description: options of geocode service (see {@link http://ignf.github.io/geoportal-access-lib/latest/jsdoc/module-Services.html#~geocode Gp.Services.geocode})
params.name: options.geocodeOptions

params.description: options of geocode service
params.name: options.geocodeOptions.serviceOptions

params.description: options of autocomplete service (see {@link http://ignf.github.io/geoportal-access-lib/latest/jsdoc/module-Services.html#~autoComplete Gp.Services.autoComplete})
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions

params.description: options of autocomplete service
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions.serviceOptions

params.description: trigger a geocoding request if the autocompletion does not return any suggestions, false by default
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions.triggerGeocode

params.description: waiting time before sending the geocoding request, 1000ms by default
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions.triggerDelay
options.zoomTo
